name: Mirage Forest
description:
Mirage Forest is about a male teenager, named Kaizen. He wakes up and finds he has amnesia and has awoken in a mysterious World. The only thing he remembers is that he is searching for his “waifu” that he vaguely remembers. Thus he begins his search to find clues on where the waifu could be.

During his search, he comes across a Large Gate which is locked by a Special 4 piece
Puzzle. Unsure of what to do he finds routes elsewhere which are all originating from the central point. Taking these paths he encounters obstacles in the forms of puzzles and different characters like Spirits and even glimpses of the Waifu. When he finishes these puzzles he sees something from his memories.
